comments:
Debug to a breakpoint in a enum, with the source for the enum not available.

The following exception is thrown for any evaluation :

Fixed in BinaryBasedSourceGenerator, a generic type signature does not always
have a 'type parameters' part.
I also fixed a problem in SignatureExt#getTypeSuperClassInterfaces(), it was
returning an empty list if the generic signature didn't have type parameters.
Updated the patch to jdt.core.Signature.
